welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Niedernhausen, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Niedernhausen has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 30 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
